content: do you like me have a friend or family member with a gargantuan melon do you need to knit that melon a quick gift well here s your solution after searching and not finding exactly what i wanted in a hat pattern for my loved one with a 24 circumference head i whipped one together the beauty of this pattern because of the springy ribs the same size hat will fit not only a gargantuan melon but also a child sized head note the pattern calls for two different balls/colors of lion brand wool-ease chunky but you could definitely get two gargantuan melon hats from those two balls of yarn if you plan to make a solid color gargantuan melon hat you will only need one ball of lion brand wool ease chunky
